attributes.action: Referendum on Joining the European Union (EU)
attributes.additional_details:
Life under brexit is grim and getting worse, much worse. In a democracy, it is vital that people get their say on whether this is what they want. They should be able to decide if they are prepared to accept this new life of empty promises and empty shelves.
If a referendum where held in 2022 it is likely that the majority of people would reject brexit. Let's put it to the test.
attributes.background: Hold a referendum on rejoining the European Union. Voting to be permitted by all UK citizens and residents aged over 16.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: 

Hold a referendum on rejoining the European Union:
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/582432
